TestGroupDocumentation.Title: minInclusive4 GetSet Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the content of trees got by unmarshalling of the minInclusive-4.xsd based XML documents and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a negativeInteger restricted SimpleType with minInclusive value -78910736693334038172. Various XML documents specify various values in the element.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML negativeInteger minInclusive-4.xsd, unmarshalled content tree GetSet test
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls minInclusive-4-1.xml,...,minInclusive-4-5.xml documents which specify the values -78910736693334038172, -48769548574835582364, -70448048944612674044, -6214704825026942191, -1 for the negativeInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-negativeInteger-minInclusive-4 element and expects that elemObj.getValue() returns specified in xml value, then invokes elemObj.setValue(byte), elemObj.getValue() should return set value.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML negativeInteger minInclusive-4.xsd GetSet test for dynamically created content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of negativeInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-negativeInteger-minInclusive-4 type with the values: -78910736693334038172, -48769548574835582364, -70448048944612674044, -6214704825026942191, -1 and expects that elemObj.getValue() returns specified values, then invokes elemObj.setValue(byte) with various values, elemObj.getValue() should return set values.
